ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to the the Filters API in SciChart WPF v5
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates the Filters API in SciChart WPF, which gives you the ability to add simple filters to DataSeries in SciChart.
Several built-in filters are included, such as Moving Average, Linear Trendline, Polynomial Trendline, Offset and Scale. You can also create your own filters by inheriting from FilterBase.
